books.title: Effective Java
books.description: Когда волк устает бороться, он делает вид, что помудрел. Самые опасные враги те, от которых волк не думал защищаться. Так не бывает в природе: овцы целы и волки сыты. Волки – это люди, выбравшие свободу. Легко вставать, когда ты не ложился.Бегать за овцами — удел баранов. Я бегаю только за пивом.

books.title: The only Book you ll need

Try Reading it, maybe your empty purposeless hedonistic brain will actually wise up enough so you quit your job and start living as a Human

books.title: Code Testing For Dummies
books.description: Hey, whoever is reading this, i think YOU should read that one, who knows, maybe than you will stop making up baseless bullshit like "Oh ur usin ai to generate code", maybe they already saw it in YOUR OWN program plan that YOU willingly hand over to them

books.title: How to Ruin someones Day
books.description: If you only had enough primos and fates saved to reach pity once, and lost the 50/50, leaving you completely broke, what would you do? u should prolly stop playing chinese gambling simulator
